desc: Boscos Garden Center is located in Simsbury CT. We are a full garden center selling flowers, seeds, pots, trees, mulch and fertilizers.

layout.text:
Bosco's Garden Center is a family owned and operated business located in Simsbury Connecticut. Celebrating our 25th anniversary in 2022!
We're a 5 acre Garden Center and Nursery stocked with seasonal annuals, perennials, trees, and shrubs. We have everything needed to keep your home looking beautiful both inside and out. Our Garden Center is full of tools and supplies needed for the yard.
